name: Ben 5: Stars vs Time
description:
POWERS

- Time Power : Stop Enemies Movement

- Fire Power : Kill Enemies

- Speed Power : Increases the speed of player 

- Invincible Power : Energy Shield, enemies can not damage

- Wall Power : Player can pass inside walls

CONTROLLER

* Press "Tab" to open instructions

+ W-A-S-D or Arrow Keys to Move, Left Shift to Run, Space to Jump

+ Use Mouse to Look Environment

+ Use Mouse Right Click to use top view

+ You get a random feature every 50 seconds

+ If monsters touch you, the time is reduced by 30 seconds

+ Collect 55 stars and open the portal

+ Remember the clock is ticking
